title: Sinéad Burke | Billionaires Freak Out About Elizabeth Warren and Bernie Sanders: A Closer Look
description:
Seth takes a closer look at billionaire Mike Bloomberg reportedly being on the brink of joining the Democratic primary as Wall Street panics about the current crop of candidates.

Then, author and activist Sinéad Burke talks about attending the Met Gala and landing the cover of British Vogue, blogging about fashion and having a mannequin made from a mold of her body.

She also takes a few more questions backstage at Studio 8G.

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
